net.neoforged.neoforge.event.level
 

  • Uses of ExplosionEvent in net.neoforged.neoforge.event.level

    Subclasses of ExplosionEvent in net.neoforged.neoforge.event.level
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    ExplosionEvent.Detonate
    ExplosionEvent.Detonate is fired once the explosion has a list of affected blocks and entities.
    static class 
    ExplosionEvent.Start
    ExplosionEvent.Start is fired before the explosion actually occurs.
    class 
    ExplosionKnockbackEvent
    ExplosionKnockbackEvent is fired once the explosion has calculated the knockback velocity to add to the entity caught in blast.

    This event is not ICancellableEvent.
    This event does not use
    invalid reference 
    HasResult
    .
    This event is fired on the NeoForge.EVENT_BUS.
